alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 3:22PM EST until January 01 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Northeast Kentucky and Northern Kentucky, including the following counties, in Northeast Kentucky, Lewis. In Northern Kentucky, Mason. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM EST, emergency management reported minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Maysville, Manchester, Lewisburg, Concord, Orangeburg, Rectorville, Somo, Fleming-Mason Airport, Mount Gilead, Trinity, Helena, Mays Lick, Peed and Carrs.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
